name: Lunar: A New Chapter (Demo)
description: Max, a wonderful and helpful Teen and his young beloved sister travel over the world to save the earth from Evil Bother system and from other evil devils, but to do that, Max needs a promotion so head to the Elves Village and go and see the truth if, Max is a Wimp or a Hero! Will he pass or not? Find out in Lunar: A New Chapter (Demo)
